bibl.title: The Word Saracen ("Sarakenos") in the Papyri.
bibl.note: Papyri using the word Saracen illustrate all the characteristics attributed to Arabs prior to and following the Muslim Conquest. They also reveal the semantic transition of the word Saracen from a nomadic Arab to the occupying and settled Arab following the conquest.
bibl.seg: Mayerson Philip, The Word Saracen ("Sarakenos") in the Papyri.

Papyri using the word Saracen illustrate all the characteristics attributed to Arabs prior to and following the Muslim Conquest. They also reveal the semantic transition of the word Saracen from a nomadic Arab to the occupying and settled Arab following the conquest.
